channel.title: Combat stone or maxhit dummy
channel.description:
i was wondering how to make this [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/2VRTrz.png[/img]
so when someone attacks it, they hit there maxhit.
but i cant figure out how to make it show there maxhit >.>
also i would like to add the combat stone so they can get xp
i know its something like
case ####: c.getattackskill
but i cant figure out where to add that either -.-
any help is greatly apreciated
